plugin.title: Audiodescription
plugin.compatibility: Compatible with 4.1; controlbar button works from 4.3; state/volume flashvars work from 4.4; dock button works from 4.5
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin plays a closed audiodescription with a video. For the 4.3 player or higher, the plugin will place a button in the controlbar. For the 4.5 button or higher, the plugin can also place a button in the dock.

flashvar.name: debug
flashvar.description: Use this to debug the ducking functionality. When set to "true", the plugin renders the waveform and ducking percentage on screen.

flashvar.name: ducking
flashvar.description: The volume percentage the original audio is ducked (0 to 100). For example, if your original volume is 90, you might want to set this to 80 to almost completely duck the original. Ducking only works for clients using Flash player 10+ (90%).

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Location of the audiodescription MP3 to play.

flashvar.name: state
flashvar.description: Set this to "false" to turn off the audiodescription by default.

flashvar.name: volume
flashvar.description: Volume of the audiodescription. The AD volume will not change whenever the main volume is changed.
